court: IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
judgment_text:
:1:

IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY

IN IN IN ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION

OFFICIAL OFFICIAL OFFICIAL ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006 ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006 ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006

IN IN IN

INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY NO. 51 OF 1953 NO. 51 OF 1953 NO. 51 OF 1953

Re: M/s. Haji Mohammed Hoossain, a firm. ... Insolvent.

Ex-parte :

M/s. Laxmichand Shamji & Co.

... Petitioning Creditor.

....

Mr. Y.C. Parikh, Official Assignee present.

.....

CORAM CORAM CORAM : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J.

th th th DECEMBER 2006. DECEMBER 2006. DECEMBER 2006.

P.C. P.C. P.C. : : :

.

An order of adjudication was passed on 18th April

.

The

pro-rata dividend of Rs.0.65 ps.

in a

rupee

was

declared

on

th

February on

the

proved

preferential

liability of Rs.1,83,569.61 ps.

and further

first

and final dividend of Rs.0.80 ps.

in the rupee

to

the

unsecured Creditors on proved unsecured liability

of

Rs.1,38,308/-.

At present there is a cash balance of Rs.

,665.31

ps.

and

Rs.4,79,619/-

invested

with

a

Nationalised

Bank.

Thus,

the

aggregate

amount

of

Rs.4,90,284.31

ps.

is lying in the estate as against the

Unsecured Liability of Rs.2,28,743.20 ps. No further

recoveries are possible.

.

The Official Assignee has prayed for permission to

declare the second and final dividend on unsecured proved

liability.

.

Prayer clause (a) of the report of the Official

Assignee is accordingly granted.
